ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Funny :)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Be careful how often you decide to do this quest.  Or you ll find that you cannot bank in Halas.  The banker is a member of the rogue guild.  And he won t
ygData.messageBody:
> My thurs group ( I am a cleric there) warrior and I (we're roomates)
> were waiting for Beyond the Mat to start so we logged on and decided to
> try the Langseax quest once (5 normal langs so far, good money, but not
> the prize we've been looking for).

Be careful how often you decide to do this quest. Or you'll find
that you cannot bank in Halas. The banker is a member of the
rogue guild. And he won't mind wiping the floor with you if he
sees you.

Harmonic, low dubious to said banker ;-)

Plus, I'm KOS to corrupt guards in Qeynos. And Lt. Dagnor or
whatever his name is doesn't mind dropping a 600 HT and 350 dmg
per attack melee on you either. So where are all these 'good'
guards? Shouldn't they be standing up for me? Yet another
flaw of the faction system.
